item.description:
let's meetup at precinct bar in union square, somerville, to hear some great soul and r&b music by two terrific bands.

the somerville news says, "No one wants to follow the Swinedells."

the boston globe calls them "an old-fashioned soul band that knows how to swing, groove, and build excitement...."

if you like high-powered r&b and you haven't seen the swinedells in action, you've got to make it to one of their shows. why not this one?

check out their music on myspace.

jordan valentine and the sunday saints have been together for less than a year, but the press has definitely noticed them. noise magazine's description of jordan valentine as "Otis Reddingâ€™s long lost daughter raised on a steady diet of Billie Holiday" is especially right on.

listen to the sunday saints's music on myspace and their band website and you'll hear why ms. valentine has twice won the boston phoenix best music poll award for Best R&B act.

then come on out to precinct to hear her pour out the soul.
item.how_to_find_us: i'll email a cell # to all 'Yes' and 'Maybe' RSVPers on friday @ 4p, 15 may
item.name: The Swinedells & Jordan Valentine and the Sunday Saints
